item.title: Marie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Marie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Marie add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Marie add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Marie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Marie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Marie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Marie add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Marie add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the road less traveled by and they CANCELLED MY FRIKKIN' SHOW. I totally shoulda took the road that had all those people on it. Damn." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Marie add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "There’s a fine line between support and stalking and let’s all stay on the right side of that." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Marie add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "You're going to burn in a very special level of hell. A level they reserve for child molesters and people who talk at the theater." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Marie add a quote by Marti Noxon, Buffy the Vampire Slayer
item.description: "Spike (to Giles) : Oh, poor Watcher. Did your life pass before your eyes — 'Cuppa tea, cuppa tea... almost got shagged... cuppa tea'?" -- Marti Noxon, Buffy the Vampire Slayer

item.title: Marie add a quote by Buffy the Vampire Slayer writers
item.description: "Buffy Summers: (to Spike) "I could NEVER be your girl!" -- Buffy the Vampire Slayer writers

item.title: Marie add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "My professional aspirations were simple - I wanted to be an intergalactic princess." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Marie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Stop," I said. "Please do not further endorken yourself to me. You have great hair and a car that is most fly, and you have just saved me with your mad ninja driving skills, so do not sully your heroic hottie image in my mind by further reciting your nerdy scholastic agenda. Don't tell me what you're studying, Steve, tell me what's in your soul. What haunts you?" And he was like, "Dude, you need to cut back on the caffeine." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Marie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Only cops and vampires have to have an invitation to enter." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Marie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Let me say right here, if I haven't made it clear, that I have seen as many pale, naked old-man parts in the last twenty-four hours to bruise my delicate psyche for a lifetime, so don't be surprised if you someday find me wandering the moors at midnight, a crazed look in my eye, babbling about albino Tater Tots nesting in Brillo pads and being pursued by sagging man ass, because that shit can happen when you've been traumatized." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Marie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "She knew it should bother her more, being evil and all, but after she put on a little mascara and some lipstick and poured herself another cup of blood-laced coffee, she found that she was okay with it." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Marie add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I like the way you've let your hair go curly," he finally said. "Suits your personality. Lots of energy, not much control, sexy as hell," Joe Morelli to Stephanie Plum" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Marie add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description:
"Babe,' Ranger said. 'Do something with her.'
And he disconnected.
I called Ranger back. 'No,' I said. 'And I need information on Jelly Kantner. His apartment got blown up, and I need to find him.'
And I should do this why?'
Because you like me.'
There was a full beat of silence. 'I do,' Ranger said. 'I like you a lot. Sometimes I'm not sure why. Give me a couple minutes." -- Janet Evanovich
